name: Max Trauma
description:
A detective helps a poor man trying to figure out the cause of his trauma. After a violent outburst in a courtroom, Jesse Anime uncovers the truth.

WASD movement, one shot, one melee esc skip cutscene R - Reloads ammo Space - Smash to get away from grabbers Killing enemies restores ammo
